Key Match Events: Lane Thomas and Josh Naylor each hit two-run homers for AL Central-leading Cleveland
Gavin Williams pitched seven sharp innings, allowing one run and one hit
Josh Naylor followed with his 29th homer, a 420-foot drive to center on a 1-0 fastball
José Ramírez led off the sixth with an infield single off Kris Bubic
Josh Naylor added a sacrifice fly in the eighth
Pre-Game Insights: The right-hander walked two while throwing 46 pitches in the first two innings. But he settled down from there, retiring his final 16 batters
The Guardians began the day with a 3 1/2-game lead over Minnesota and Kansas City in the division
The Royals played without manager Matt Quatraro, who missed the game because of a personal matter. Bench coach Paul Hoover ran the team in Quatraro's absence
Post-Match Reflections: Garcia said Williams threw more curveballs 'and we didn’t make the adjustment'
Michael Wacha (11-7) permitted two runs and five hits in five innings in his first loss since June 22
Miscellaneous Highlights: Garcia doubled home Yuli Gurriel in the second for Kansas City
Emmanuel Clase handled the ninth for his 41st save. He has converted 28 consecutive save chances
Bobby Witt Jr. served as the designated hitter in place of shortstop
